caption.p: Results of field fitness traits ( A) fruit set on mowed and unmowed locations (P < 0.001), ( B) number of seed per fruit (Y-axis) (P = 0.809), ( C) 100 seeds mass (Y-axis) (treatment P < 0.001), ( D) total number of seeds (Y-axis) (P < 0.001). Means are shown by scale bars and asterisk denotes significantly different results at p < 0.05, while ns denotes non-significant results.
